name: treatment of waste plastic plaster, sorting plant | waste plastic plaster | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10181/documentation

The process represents the sorting of 'waste plastic plaster' for final disposal. The waste contains 1kg plastic plaster, while its density is 1300 kg/m3.

The activity starts with the waste being available at the gate of the treatment facility. Collection and transportation of the waste to the treatment plant is not included.

The activity includes particulate matter emissions from dismantling and handling, machines for handling in sorting plant, electricity demand for sorting plant, and final disposal of waste material.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Modelling parameters specific to the technology mix encountered in Switzerland in late 1990ies
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Building demolition with skid-steer loaders. Dry sorting plant for building wastes with pre-sorting of mixed waste, crushing and manual sorting.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: waste-specific calculation based on literature data
